snippet: The Spanish player Nuria Llagostera Vives was suspended for two years after testing positive for methamphetamine last summer.
abstract: Spanish tennis player, Nuria Llagostera Vives, is suspended for two years after testing positive for methamphetamine last summer.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish player Nuria Llagostera Vives was suspended for two years after testing positive for methamphetamine last summer.
